reviews.review: 游戏是好游戏，如果不禁播，绝对火爆

Something needs to be done about loopers. It's impossible to play as a killer when everyone is looping around as soon as they see you. you can't even defend the generators because everyone goes to the furthest generators on the map and when you find one person and you try to catch them they just constantly loop and everyone else just fixes generators. if you leave the looper for 2 seconds they're back at repairing a generator. it's pretty much impossible to win anymore.
if you only want to play survivor then i recommend this game. 
if you want to have fun as a killer you've come to the wrong place
エンドゲーム(直球)
很赞的游戏
패기 칼찌 시계 데드하드 이게 게임이냐 메튜야 ㅡㅡ
I love this game!!! i wish the levels got bigger or had a harder option for survivors but holy cow such a strong game!!
這遊戲已經去到一個極不公平的地步 BUG又多 只弄得鬼方的技能很厲害 人方則限制很多技能 例如大跑之後不會回復疲勞狀況，殲滅打擊等等... 根本鬼全部玩光... 不會考慮到玩人方的感受 只是永遠把鬼強化 10場入面只是1,2場是走到的 根本不用玩 極不推薦這遊戲。。
这是我第一次见到这么缺点的游戏   非常不推荐各种bug卡顿
Как по мне, игра очень крутая! Советую.

moro
So much fun apart from when i have to replace my celeron with integrated graphics every 30 to 45 minutes and the other day my ddr2 500mb ram exploded

很刺激的游戲，而且不是抄襲的 :)
推薦各位喜歡挑戰的小夥伴們買!!

P.S. 這款游戲不是第x人格的電腦版，第x人格是抄襲這款游戲的，詳情請參考網路還有兩款游戲的上市時間 謝謝<3
toxic, terrible devs ballance, endgame patch BLOWS!

プレイ時間１０００時間弱です。
ゲームのブームが次々移り変わる昨今、ここまでハマって遊ぶことが出来るゲームに巡り合うことのほうが稀ですので、このゲームには愛着もありますし、感謝もしています。が、これから購入を検討の方には絶対にお勧めしません。

まず、このゲームの良いところですが、
４ｖｓ１の非対称対戦システムが非常に熱いです。
サバイバー側はコミュニケーションの取れない他のサバイバーと協力して脱出を、キラー側はそれを阻止します。
サバイバーよりもキラーの方が足が速いので普通に追いかけられればあっという間に捕まりますが、フィールド上に点在する障害物で時間を稼ぐ事が可能です。
この駆け引きはサバイバーもキラーもプレイ時間が延びれば伸びるほど奥深いものだと気づくでしょう。
サバイバーをじわじわと追いつめるキラーになるもよし、キラーを上手に撒く歴戦サバイバーになるもよしの一粒で２度おいしいゲームになってます。どちら側も楽しいです。
また、ホラーと謳っていますが、現実はホラー風味位ですので女性の方でも安心して遊べるでしょうし、キラーのデザインも非常に秀逸です。（ゲロ女は不評でしたが）

しかし、それだけの魅力がありながら私が推奨しない理由は、他の方が挙げているように、プレイヤーの質やゲームバランス・・・ではなく運営の悪質な業務態度によるものが殆どです。

バグの放置は当たり前、パッチノートに表記の無いサイレント修正は常習犯。
何かを導入すればバグが増える。修正すると別の個所にバグが起こる。
ずっと最強キラーのナースビリーは殆ど修正せず、中堅どころの有料DLCキラーは謎の弱体化。
不遇なキラーが嫌ならGo to CIV　(別ゲーしてろ）と言い放つ
不手際でお漏らししてしまったバグ並みの強さを誇るパーク（英雄の奮起）は即導入。修正なし。
途中退室の罰則がほぼ０の為、回線切りは日常茶飯事。肝心の通報システムは全く機能していない。

書き出すとキリがないです。

そして、一番致命的なのが外部ボイスチャットツールに対して何の対策も打たないこと。

試合終了までキラー側のパークをみえないようにする「だけ」の対応に数年待たされました。
しかしそれも根本的な解決には全くなっておらず、休日ゴールデンタイムのマッチングはずっと前から無法地帯です。

ちなみにVCPTを相手にキラーをプレイするのは、よほど手練れの猛者でもない限り勝ち目はありません。
また３人を斬り伏せても最後の一人にハッチ逃げされればチャット画面で言いたいように言われ放題です。
（この辺りは、キラーの側に３人以上殺害でWINと表示すれば、それだけで溜飲が下がるはずなのにそれすら導入しません）
以上のように、VCPTを相手にすることに一切のメリットがないにも関わらず、キラー側にはたまに混ざったVCPTに対して見た目では何の判断基準も与えられません。その為、一切の対策も打てません。
同時に４人入ってきた時にキラーは部屋の解散を選択（対戦の拒否）が出来ます。が、この仕様がサバイバーのフラストレーションを高めています。
そもそも、ボイチャ非推奨を謳っておきながらパーティー戦闘を可能にした事が本当に謎です。

以上の点から、私は、これからこのゲームを検討中の方に購入をお勧めしません。
キラー側とサバイバー側のマナーであるとか、バランスの問題はどちら側をより長くプレイしているかで大きく評価が変わるところでしょうが、運営の対応の劣悪さは異常です。プレイ時間が長くなるほどにその杜撰さが露呈します。
人気タイトルですが、やはりその辺がインディーズの域を出ない作品に留まっている理由でしょう。

一刻も早く運営の脳みそが入れ替わる事を祈っています。

2019/06/28 追記

ついに公式からVCを認める発言が出ました。
現在公式が調整に対して触れているのは、野良PTとVCPTの格差のみです。

もうこのゲームは駄目です。絶対に買ってはいけません。
まもなくキラーは絶滅します。

Я висел, меня снимали.

I love this flawed game! dbd can be so much fun as both survivor and killer, one of my favorite multiplayer games <3

PROS!
+FUN TIMES!
+variety, can play as different killers or survivors  
+mostly friendly community, but the game tends to push people often, as if the game is DESIGNED THIS WAY.
+dev team have made decent changes overall

CONS :(
-WE NOW HAVE DEDICATED SERVERS! will the pallet drop?
-players disconnect at times
-game crashes/visual bugs with skins, too many bugs in general!
-slugging, camping, doing gens, lots of dull moments

Update 07/02/2021: I still love this game, but with that being said, it is likely one of the most buggy games I've ever played. There are some weeks or months with less bugs, but wow does it get pretty bad sometimes. The developers really need more software quality assurance done on this game.

Proposal of "Nine Tailed Fox" Korean killer

It can transform into a survivor's figure.

When "Nine Tailed Fox" is a survivor, you can turn the generator and treat it with other survivors.

The attack is only possible with the appearance of "Nine Tailed Fox".

Stalking gauges rise when co-ordinating actions with survivors or near. The survivor also has a fascinating debuff with "Nine Tailed Fox" nearby.

It is displayed to the survivor from 3 minutes after engaging in a fascinating debuff, or from the end game activation.

"Nine Tailed Fox" permanently gains the following effects depending on the stalking gauge.


Step 1: "Nine Tailed Fox" and the survivor's transition speed is moderately faster.

Step 2: The ghost ball appears and continues to visually inform the direction of the last survivor. "Nine Tailed Fox" and the survivor look very fast.

Step 3 ("Nine Tailed Fox" style reinforcement): You can jump in a short distance with low penalty.

Step 3 (Strengthen survivor form): You can follow all the actions a survivor can do.

Sudden murder: human liver extraction.


Nine Tailed Fox 's victory conditions are different if you choose to strengthen the survivor form in three stages.

When "Nine Tailed Fox" chooses to reinforce Survivor form in the 3 stage selection, Enchantment Debuff can not escape. Survivors can also use amulets.

Survivor of Devastating Debuffs Survivors who are caught in a fascinating debuff can not escape to the exit when the end game is activated.

A map with "Nine Tailed Fox" has created an amulet item and can be used by a user who has a survivor appearance that is expected to be "Nine Tailed Fox".

If you pick up an amulet item, the survivor's movement speed is slightly faster than that of "Nine Tailed Fox".

When using "Nine Tailed Fox" when using an amulet, "Nine Tailed Fox" can not attack the survivor for 30 seconds. In addition, it returns to the "Nine Tailed Fox" appearance, and all the survivors' fascination is released and escape becomes possible.

If the amulet is not "Nine Tailed Fox", then the amulet-based survivor and the identified survivor are permanently unable to escape. The rest of the survivors' fascination debuffs are lifted to death. All survivors fall into incurable wounds.


-----------------------------------------------------------------



한국형 살인마 "Nine Tailed Fox" 제안

구미호는 생존자의 모습으로 변신할 수 있고

"Nine Tailed Fox"가 생존자 모습일 때 다른 생존자와 함께 발전기를 돌리거나 치료를 해줄 수 있다.

공격은 "Nine Tailed Fox"의 모습일때만 가능하다.

생존자와 협력행동을 수행하거나 가까이 있으면 스토킹 게이지가 오른다. 또한 생존자는 "Nine Tailed Fox"가 근처에 있으면 매혹 디버프에 걸린다.

매혹 디버프에 걸리고 3분 뒤부터, 혹은 엔드게임 발동시부터 생존자에게 표시된다. 

"Nine Tailed Fox"는 스토킹 게이지에 따라 다음의 효과를 영구히 얻는다.


1단계 : "Nine Tailed Fox"와 생존자의 모습 전환 속도가 적당히 빨라진다.

2단계 : 혼령구슬이 등장하며 마지막으로 타격한 생존자의 위치의 방향을 시각적으로 계속 알려준다. "Nine Tailed Fox"와 생존자의 모습 전환 속도가 매우 빨라진다.

3단계("Nine Tailed Fox" 형태 강화) : 비교적 짧은 거리를 적은 패널티로 점멸 도약할 수 있다.

3단계(생존자 형태 강화) : 생존자가 할 수 있는 모든 행동을 따라할 수 있다.

즉결 살인 : 인간의 간 적출.


3단계인 생존자 형태 강화를 선택했을 경우 "Nine Tailed Fox"의 승리조건은 달라진다.

"Nine Tailed Fox"가 3단계 선택에서 생존자 형태 강화를 선택했을때 매혹 디버프의 탈출 불가 효과가 발동된다. 또한 생존자는 부적을 사용할 수 있다.

매혹 디버프의 탈출 불과 효과란 매혹 디버프에 걸린 생존자는 엔드게임 발동시 출구로 탈출할 수 없다.

"Nine Tailed Fox"가 참여한 맵에는 부적 아이템이 생성되어 있으며, "Nine Tailed Fox"라고 예상되는 생존자 모습을 한 유저에게 사용할 수 있다.

부적 아이템을 집으면 생존자의 이동속도가 "Nine Tailed Fox"의 이동속도보다 조금 더 빨라진다.

부적 사용시 "Nine Tailed Fox"가 맞을경우 "Nine Tailed Fox"는 30초간 모든 능력을 잃고 생존자를 공격할 수 없다. 또한 "Nine Tailed Fox" 모습으로 되돌아가고 모든 생존자의 매혹 상태가 풀리며 탈출이 가능해진다.

부적을 사용한 대상이 "Nine Tailed Fox"가 아닐경우 부적을 사용한 생존자와 지목당한 생존자는 영구히 탈출이 불가능하다. 나머지 생존자들의 매혹 디버프는 빈사 상태가 되어야 해제된다. 모든 생존자는 치료불능 부상상태에 빠진다.
いいね!

I only recommend this game if you have friends to play with. The dev team absolutely caters to the survivors. There's always a killer nerf on pretty much every patch, sometimes there's 2 killer nerfs in one patch. Survivors control every game, not the killers. There's only a select few perks to use if you want to play and win as a killer, and there's only about 4-5 killers worth even using in the higher ranks. It's a decent game, but it's slowly headed towards the same situation as Friday the 13th.

Comunidade tóxica, jogo bugado e nivelamento de jogadores inexistente. Passei muitas horas jogando com amigos e conheci um pessoal legal no jogo, mas sinceramente estou desanimado demais.

Gosto de jogar de sobrevivente e a cada atualização parece que favorecem cada vez mais os Killers. Assassinos que ficam camperando, fazendo tunelling e sendo tóxicos não são punidos e aparecem cada vez mais.

A mecânica é boa, tem muito conteúdo mas parece que o foco dos desenvolvedores é ferrar com o que funciona e manter a parte ruim do jogo

3/10 it's just a metaphor of what EA does to DICE

I really like this game and I think it is built well and can be a lot of fun, but there is so much toxicity that I never really leave the game happy.  I've been called many bad names just for winning or even when not winning as a killer.  If there was a better way to ban people like this from playing then I'm sure the game would be good, but It's hard to enjoy because of the people that you play against and with.

破滅弱体化、発電スピードアップで猛烈サバイバー有利ゲーム！
サバイバーのフラストレーションを考慮して毎回サバイバー有利の調整を繰り返し、今ではサバイバーのマッチに10分近くかかる焚火を眺めるスクリーンセイバーと化している。

自分はサバイバーランク１でキラーは６ですが、サバイバーは正直パークなんてなんでもいいし、ノーパークでも赤帯になれるぐらいのヌルゲー！対してキラーはウルトラレアアドオンやガチパーク構成でもない限りまともなマッチにはならない。

このような能無し運営のバグ祭りゲームでも、キラーでボランティア活動をしないとスクリーンセイバーになってしまうから現在はキラーメインでプレイしてますが、場合によってはキャンプ（やりたかないけど）トンネルをしないと圧倒的に不利な状況になるのでキラーのトンネルは運営がこのようなバランス調整をした結果だから「ゲームの仕様」と思った方がいい！

挙句の果てには最近ではコンシューマーのプレイヤーがクロスプレイを切っているのもありマッチングしない！
日本はサーバーが括られていてので東南アジア人としかほぼマッチしません。（マナーや民度が悪いから海外の掲示板では日本人プレイヤーは非常に嫌われる）

総じてヒットしたゲームがこれしかない運営はキラーが居なくなってしまうと破綻するので楽観視してると大変なことになることを自覚するべきでしょう。
最近ではこのゲームで収益の大半をあげているyoutuberもいるので、サバイバー有利バランスの調整を早急にするべき。

Das Spiel war am Anfang noch recht gut (2018) und seit den letzten 2-3 Patches, wo beschlossen wurde das der Killer die Luke zu machen kann wenn nur noch ein Überlebender lebt oder alle Generatoren fertig sind man dann noch gezwungen ist in 3 MINUTEN ein Tor zu öffnen ist echt unter alle sau! klar ist es unfair das manche Spieler nach dem Game noch provozieren müssen weil sie nicht raus gehen aber das Update hat ja mal das ganze Spiel kaputt gemacht weil man keine Chance mehr gegen den Killer hat! Entweder der Killer weiß direkt wo die Luke ist und macht sie zu damit man zu einem der Tore rennen muss oder er sucht die Luke und bewacht dann die Tore, was soll da denn noch an Spielspaß sein?. Dann sind die Killer meistens so overpowert das man am Anfang des Spiels schon genau weiß das man nicht gewinnen kann aber das ist meiner Meinung nach ein Problem was man selber hat weil es um können geht. Ich hoffe einfach das das Spiel wenigstens länger Zeit gibt oder die Zeit raus nimmt sonst sehe ich da wenig Zukunft drin...

Multiplayer doesnt lend anything to this besides watching other people play while you are pinned against a wall. Maybe i am not the best person to give a review since i just didnt enjoy a minute of playing it, but then i cant get a refund so yeah, dont buy. Game sucks.

Игра хорошая, но ее надо дорабатывать и дорабатывать. Баги, иногда диссбаланс и вылеты. Возможно иногда баги прикольная тема но что меня постоянно бесит, это когда игра просто полностью зависает при загрузки чего либо(в игре). Игра бы могла стать шедевром если не похуизм разрабов. Нет чтобы исправить баги в продаете в Нарнию с помощью заборов или опять же исправить  экран загрузки. А нахуй нам это надо, давайте лучше зафигачим этог 10 DLS и забьем хуй на лаги. Ну а так игра ниче впринципе если с лагоми у вас повезет(то есть лагов не будет) то ... .то нормально

Game started quite well in the very beginning. With all upcoming DLCs, they really messed up the balance of the game. Besides from everything, your fate just depends on the killer. If he decides to tunnel or camp, there is nothing you can do to avoid. Some people even don't care about "winning" or getting more bloodpoints. They just want to ruin your game by camping or tunneling. I am so tired with everything to be honest and regret buying this game. Not to mention the broken matchmaking. Two survivours sacrificed already, one dying on the hook, and one wounded - just another evening on Yamoka Estate - classic Japanese mansion in the middle of overgrown garden. I just lost the wounded survivor I was chasing, but that was okay - i knew exactly he was going to rescue the hooked one. I threw a hatchet just right - juicy splash sound and scream told me I just got another four-kills round. Just pick up the downed survivor, hook him, and prepare for post-game chat shitstorm. 
Dead by Daylight follows a scheme of typical horror - group of friends try to escape a killer. Here we have four survivors and trying to fix 5 generators to power up gates that allow them to escape. Killer on the other had does what killers do - damages generators, hunts survivors and places them on sacrificial hooks. While it sounds simple, maybe even kinda boring (sometimes i catch myself wondering why i have fun watching progress bar of the generator), couple of thousand players every day gotta mean something. 
Currently, there are 15 killers available in game - from Wraith with his invisibility, through hatchet-throwing Huntress to ever-stalking Shape. Killers differ between themselves by their powers, in addition to perks (later). And as such it requires different playstyle when playing as chainsaw-running Hillbilly, and different when playing as blinking Nurse. Killers also have power addons - they can use up to two of them each trail, with different effects depending on rarity - for example, Huntress can use addons that increase her speed when preparing to throw a hatchet, carry more hatchers, inflict various status effects on hit survivors, or simply down them upon successful throw (although this decreases amount of carried hatchets by 4, where default is 5).
Survivors have to outsmart (or outrun, later) the killer, fix generators, and finally open exit gates to survive the trial. They don't differ that much between themselves (other than looks or names) - they are defined by three personal perks, that with progression can be unlocked for other survivors (therefore i kinda see survivor selection as purely cosmetic to some degree). Additionally, they can bring to the trial (or find them in chests scattered around the map) items that can help them win - such as medkits to heal themselves or the others (survivors have 3 health states: Healthy, Wounded and Dying), toolboxes to speed up generator fixes or temporalily destroying hooks, flashlights to blind killers for a few seconds and so on. Just like Killers' powers, those items can have addons attached, which increase their effectiveness or duration of use.
Every action provides players with Bloodpoints, which are later used for character (or characters; Bloodpoints are collected per account, not per character) progression. This takes place on the Bloodweb, where each character is offered a few randomly generated nodes containing items, item/power addons, perks or offerings. Each completed bloodweb on given character increases their level, unlocks perk slots (at 5th, 10th and 15th level), and gradually increases the bloodweb size, up to level 50th (which allows to increase perstiege level on that character, in return for prestiege cosmetic set element).
Perks give character special active or passive abilities which make some game aspects easier, or harder for opponent. Both killers and survivors have their own, shared pool of perks, and each character has 3 unique to them perks - that is until levels 30, 35 and 40 of bloodweb, where they can unlock them to be found by other killers/survivors. Each character can have up to 4 perks active at the same time, and i have to say - it's kinda fun to think of builds to use, even though there are some meta perks for both sides.
Last type of unlockables, the offerings offer bonuses to the players. For example you can get 50-75-100% more Bloodpoints in given category (Objective, Survival, Altruism and Boldness for survivors, Hunting, Deviousness, Brutality and Sacrifice for killers), increase your, or every survivors' luck by few percent, increase Bloodpoints gained in all categories by 25 or 100% for either you or all players in the game. Some of them influence map layouts or visibility, by for example increasing/decreasing amount of chests with items spawning on the map, increasing/decreasing distance between hooks, or thickening or lessening the mist. Killers can also get Mori offerings, that allow them to either kill the last survivor by their hand, kill one survivor that was hooked at least once, or kill any survivor that was hooked at least once. 
If you are wondering what to start learning first - Nurses blinks, distracting killers ect. - i'd say develop thick skin first, because the community can be the worst part of the game. There are plenty of ways players can be asses to each other - t-bagging survivors, killers standing next to hooked player to prevent his teammates from rescuing him ect. Truth is, both sides have their own made-up sets of rules, and as such survivors can blame killer for camping even if it was another survivor trying to loop killer near the hook (killers are slightly faster than survivors, so any straight chase in the open has only one ending. Survivors on the other hand have map elements to help negate killers speed, such as vaulting through the windows, dropping pallets ect. This is called looping - using map to distract or escape killer), or by simply checking area around the hook before leaving to find others. Another common "rule" is tunnelling - if the killer finds freshly-off-the-hook survivor and his rescuer, survivors are mad when killer goes after already wounded player (common sense, really - enemy you have to hit once to down him vs enemy you have to hit twice). Or calling killers off for using "overpowered" perks such as earlier mentioned NOED or Hex:Ruin, which slows generator fixing process (like, come on, there are just 5 totems spawning on each map, and these are in-game for a reason). Killers are no better - they tend to get mad for "gen rushing" - survivors focusing on quickly completing generators, usually when one of the survivors is a distraction for the killer (I DID mention that generators are the only thing survivors have to do? Yeah I did - blame survivors for doing their jobs). They also get mad for looping, "overpowered" survivor perks, or for bringing flashlights, but the most common reason for killers going toxic on survivors are SWF groups - players grouping up with their friends, usually with some communication app (apart from 2 hand gestures, there is no in-game communication), which gives them some coordination advantage. i'll just add that it's a good idea to play as both killers and survivors - learning strengths of the enemy can definitely help.
I havent really ran into any major bugs so far (130hrs), there is a ranking system (kinda broken, as it requires tremendous amount of work to progress), and i'm kinda reaching the limit here - I had fun for over 100 hours, there is still plenty to unlock, microtransaction system deserves commendation, you can unlock most DLC characters can be unlocked with in-game currency (Iridescent Shards, for profile leveling), or just their perks on weekly-changing Shrine of Secrets (4 random perks per week, 2 for survivors, 2 for killers), premium currency only for cosmetics (some can be bought with shards).
All in all, I'm having fun

Игра повествует о истории четверых подростков, трое из которых отбитые идиоты (разумеется, вы не один из них) и маньяке-педофиле, который питается ими (обожает тушёных Кладетток на обед и фаршированных Маг на ужин).
Вы играете в роли главного рациона маньяка, разумеется, по всем законам подлости, вы единственная надежда на победу.
   Если же решили перейти линию закона, и рискнуть восемью годами жизни (стать маньяком), то учтите, вашими противниками на этот раз будут мусора под прикрытием, лучшие охотники на любителей "помоложе",  которые, будьте уверены, сбегут от вас нахрен. Игрушка очень весёлая и занимательная, а самое главное - познавательная! Именно в ней вы узнаете, что пробив плечо человека толстущим, как половой орган маньяка, металлическим крюком, человек не помрёт от болевого шока, не будет орать полчаса на всю округу, а даже сможет двигать рукой! Пока вы думаете, каким лешим, ваш персонаж вообще всё ещё стоит на ногах, ваших союзников изнасилует Мементо-Мори, а вы спокойно найдёте люк, сбежите, а позже узнаете нечто новое о личной жизни своей мамы, о чём вам обязательно расскажут ваши союзники и маньяк :).

正直、現環境のままでは友人にお勧めすることができません。
サバイバーとキラーのバランスが悪く、楽しく遊ぶのが難しいと思います。

最近のアップデートで大きく環境が変わったため新たにレビューを書かせてもらいます。

新しいＵＩと新しいキャラクターのモーションが実装され、さらにパークの調整も行われました。
新しいＵＩはかなり見づらく、今までのＵＩに慣れていたプレイヤーは非常に遊びにくいでしょう。
新しいモーションは今までのモーションと比べ、なんだか違和感を感じます。特に負傷時の走るモーションは明らかに雰囲気に合っておらずマヌケに見えてしまいます。
当たり判定もかなりバグっていて今までの感覚でプレイしていると痛い目を見ることもあります。
パークの調整もサバイバー側のパークが強化されましたが、キラー側のパークは弱体化されています。特にＤＬＣのキャラクターから使えるパークを大幅に弱体化したのは良い判断とは思えません。

正直、今の環境で遊ぶのはオススメしません。楽しむよりもストレスが溜まってしまい、ゲームが嫌いになってしまいます。
運営にはもっとユーザーの声を聞いて、調整を行っていただきたいです。
